text: Hagi Tola ne' mofavreramimofo zamagi'a, Uzi'ma, Refaia'ma, Jerieli'ma, Jamai'ma, Ipsamu'ma, Samueli'e. Hagi ama ana vahetamina Tola nagapina mago mago naga nofimofo ugagota kva vahetami ana knafina mani'naze. Hagi ana nagapinti'ma hankavenentake sondia vahetmimofo zamagima Deviti'ma kini mani'nea knafima kre'za eri fatgoma hu'nazana, 22tausen 600'a vahetami zamagi avontafepina krente'naze.
